mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IA_PROMOTION_TN ( PROMOTION_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE_ID, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_DT, ACCEPT_YN ) VALUES ( #{promotion_id}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{file_id}, #{regist_user_id}, NOW(), 'N' )

INSERT INTO IA_FILE_TN ( ORI_NAME, FILE_ID, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, FILE_EXT, FILE_URL, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{ori_name}, #{file_id}, #{file_size}, #{file_path}, #{file_ext}, #{file_url}, #{regist_user_id}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IA_PROMOTION_TN WHERE ACCEPT_YN = "Y"

SELECT ROW, SEQ, PROMOTION_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE_ID, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_DT, ACCEPT_YN FROM ( SELECT @row_number := @row_number + 1 AS ROW, IA.* FROM ( SELECT SEQ, PROMOTION_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE_ID, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_DT, ACCEPT_YN FROM IA_PROMOTION_TN WHERE ACCEPT_YN = 'Y' ) IA, (SELECT @row_number := 0) r ) AS T WHERE ROW = #{i}

SELECT FILE_URL FROM IA_FILE_TN WHERE FILE_ID IN ( SELECT FILE_ID FROM ( SELECT @row_number := @row_number + 1 AS ROW, IA.* FROM ( SELECT SEQ, PROMOTION_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE_ID, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_DT, ACCEPT_YN FROM IA_PROMOTION_TN WHERE ACCEPT_YN = 'Y' ) IA, (SELECT @row_number := 0) r ) AS T WHERE ROW = #{i} )
SELECT SEQ, PROMOTION_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE_ID, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_DT, ACCEPT_YN FROM IA_PROMOTION_TN WHERE 1=1 AND PROMOTION_ID = #{promotion_id} AND TITLE = #{title}
